name: Verify Admin can change User role to Manager
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `User` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can change user role from `User` to `Manager`
- User after changing role from `User` to `Manager`:

- Can access organization `Settings`
- Can access organization `Billing`
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with User role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can change user role from User to Manager

  • User after changing role from User to Manager:

  • Can access organization Settings

  • Can access organization Billing

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `User` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can change user role from `User` to `Manager`
- User after changing role from `User` to `Manager`:

- Can access organization `Settings`
- Can access organization `Billing`
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with User role via API.

Verify that:

  • Admin can change user role from User to Manager

  • User after changing role from User to Manager:

  • Can access organization Settings

  • Can access organization Billing
